title: Get Help from Healer Nettie
content:
se from again. Choosing dialogue 2 will interest Nettie, she asks for more information. This will give you the following dialogue options.

On a mind flayer ship - I was kidnapped and infected, I don't know, I just woke up with it. You're asking a lot of questions... Look, are you going to cure me or not?

Choosing dialogue 1 shocks Nettie. She is honest and tells you that you are dangerous but because you're a good person she will try to save you by giving you wyvern poison to swallow if you fe
